synopsis.text: Ikebashi, a dedicated producer, and his eleven-member idol group, Ongaku Shoujo, are relentlessly working to climb the ladder of success in the music industry. Despite their unwavering efforts, the group remains underrated, struggling with low sales and popularity. In a bid to revitalize the group and propel them towards success, Ikebashi initiates an audition to recruit a new member, hoping they'll be the spark Ongaku Shoujo needs. Enter Hanako Yamadaki, who joins the group and embarks on a shared journey to reach the pinnacle of the music world, aiming to transform Ongaku Shoujo into one of the most sought-after idol groups.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
